notice.ch: 資訊電機學院大學部四年級可選修

remark.ch: 資訊電機學院大學部四年級可選修

goal.ch: 教導學員離散時間域的觀念、傅立葉轉換分析、頻譜分析能力、濾波器設計等能力
goal.en: "Discrete-time signal processing, Fourier transform, spectral analysis, filter design"

outline.ch:
◎線性時不變離散時間系統(Linear-Time Invariant DSP systems)
-Discussions on Ethics for Engineers.
-Discrete-Time Signals and Systems
-The z-Transform
-Fourier Transform Analysis of Linear Time-Invariant System
-Structure for Discrete-Time Systems
◎離散時間數位濾波器設計(Filter Design of Discrete-Time Systems)
-Introduction to Filter Design Techniques
-Finite-Length Impulse Response Filter
-Infinite-Length Impulse Response Filter
◎隨機程序與高等訊號處理(Introduction to Random Signal Processing and Advanced Signal Processing)
-Discrete-Hilbert Transform
-Fast Fourier Transform
-Introduction to Random Signal Processing
-Introdcuiton to Modern Spectral analysis
outline.en:
◎(Linear-Time Invariant DSP systems)
-Discussions on Ethics for Engineers.
-Discrete-Time Signals and Systems
-The z-Transform
-Fourier Transform Analysis of Linear Time-Invariant System
-Structure for Discrete-Time Systems
◎(Filter Design of Discrete-Time Systems)
-Introduction to Filter Design Techniques

textbook.ch:
"教科書：
Alan V. Oppenheim, Ronald W. Schafer, and John R. Buck: ""Discrete-Time Signal Processing"" (Second Edition), Prentice Hall, 1999.
參考書：
Peyton Z. Peebles. “Probability, Random Variables, and Random Signal Principles” (Third Edition), McGraw-Hill, 1993."
textbook.en:
"Alan V. Oppenheim, Ronald W. Schafer, and John R. Buck: ""Discrete-Time Signal Processing"" (Second Edition), Prentice Hall, 1999.
Peyton Z. Peebles. “Probability, Random Variables, and Random Signal Principles” (Third Edition), McGraw-Hill, 1993."

gradMethod.ch: 期中考佔35%，期末考佔35%，報告佔20%，平常成績佔10%
gradMethod.en: "midterm exam 35%, final exam 35%, report 20%, roll call 10%."

ch: 系所:限電機工程學系碩士班、電機工程學系博士班。
en: Department:MSc in Electrical Engineering、PhD in Electrical Engineering only.
Faculty:College of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science only.
